summary: Three friends, finding themselves single on their thirty-third birthdays, agree to bet two thousand dollars each to see who can get a girlfriend and live together for three months.
cast: Grant Shaud|Maureen Teefy|Anthony Palermo|Holly Long|Will Ferrell|Lisa Wilcox|Nia Vardalos|Kelly Coleman|Rebeca Arthur|Pamela Gien|Starr Andreeff|Rebecca Wackler|Tia Riebling|Tangie Ambrose|Gloria Perez|Tricia Leigh Fisher|Suzy Nakamura|Stacy Edwards|Jennifer Barker|James Intveld|Edward Perez|Denny Croy|Michael Rose|Richard Green|Kenny Sira|Dax Griffin|Jeff Turmes|Linda Brookover|Nunzio Fazio|Alain Silver
title: Men Seeking Women
